items.summary_en: DuckDB-based Metabase alternative discussed on Taleshape's GitHub. The linked repo describes an analytics-oriented solution. The summary uses only the title and URL context.
items.summary_zh: 在 Taleshape 的 GitHub 上讨论了基于 DuckDB 的 Metabase 替代方案。所链接的仓库描述了一个面向分析的解决方案。摘要仅基于标题和链接上下文。

items.title_en: Warren Buffett dumps $1.7B of Amazon stock
items.title_zh: 沃伦·巴菲特抛售 17 亿美元的亚马逊股票
items.summary_en: Finbold reports Warren Buffett sold $1.7 billion of Amazon stock. The linked article provides details on the sale. The summary uses only the title and URL context.
items.summary_zh: Finbold 报道称沃伦·巴菲特出售了价值 17 亿美元的亚马逊股票。所链接的文章提供了这笔交易的细节。摘要仅基于标题和链接上下文。

items.title_en: A sitting US president launched two memecoins that wiped out $4.3B+
items.title_zh: 在任美国总统发行两枚 memecoin，市值蒸发超 4.3B
items.summary_en: A tweet claims a sitting US president launched two memecoins that wiped out over $4.3B. The linked post is a Twitter thread from Meshnet Capital. The summary uses only the title and URL context.
items.summary_zh: 一条推文声称在任美国总统发行了两枚 meme 加密货币，市值蒸发超过 43 亿美元。所链接的帖子来自 Meshnet Capital 的 Twitter。摘要仅基于标题和链接上下文。

items.title_en: Chess engines do weird stuff
items.title_zh: 棋类引擎会做怪异的事
items.summary_en: Girl.surgery discusses chess engines doing weird things. The linked page presents observations about engine behavior. The summary uses only the title and URL context.
items.summary_zh: Girl.surgery 讨论棋类引擎做出怪异行为。所链接的页面提供了对引擎行为的观察。摘要仅基于标题和链接上下文。
